BOAT.INSTRUCTIONS: Click on the rectanges, and choose a tugboat to push on each side of the ship.
BOAT.FINISH_CENTER: Congratulations you successfully made it to the center dock.
BOAT.FINISH_TOP: Congratulations you successfully made it to the top dock.
BOAT.FINISH_BOTTOM: Congratulations you successfully made it to the bottom dock.
BOAT.PICK_INSTRUCTIONS: Which tugboat size do you want to add?
CART.INSTRUCTIONS: Hey, theres an out of control shopping cart headed this way.
CART.FAIL: Bam! The cart crashed into the car.
CART.FAIL-FAST: Bam! The cart crashed into the car while moving quickly.
CART.FAIL-SLOW: Bam! The cart crashed into the car while moving slowly.
CART.SUCCESS: Success, the cart stopped before it crashed into the car.
